did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: School of Hotel Administration Dean's records, 1981-2012.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. School of Hotel Administration. Dean.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, reports, meeting minutes, distinguished speaker lists, photographs, subject files, and other records of the School of Hotel Administration, particularly pertaining to the Office of the Dean.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, reports, meeting minutes, distinguished speaker lists, photographs, subject files, and other records of the School of Hotel Administration, particularly pertaining to the Office of the Dean.
